issue.title: [Integration] Add Rust map
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13300](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13300). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm working on Rust map support at https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/pull/491.
We can add integration testing support after the PR is merged.
